author: pk910
content:
The fee recipient displayed on beaconchain.kintsugi.themerge.dev seems to be invalid?

One of my testnet validators was lucky enough to propose this block with a non-default fee recipient:
https://explorer.kintsugi.themerge.dev/block/61500

But Fee recipient just shows "0x" in the CL explorer:
https://beaconchain.kintsugi.themerge.dev/block/63095

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yes, the beacon explorer can not properly show the proposer address

author: xenonmind
content: Hey. I want to get into blockchain development on ethereum. I am fully fluent in python and above average in java. Can someone suggest me a path from where I can begin the blockchain development?
